highlights: Contributed to development and deployment of GMDP (General Motors Data Platform), GM's custom open-source Hadoop distribution, successfully migrating from Cloudera Hadoop.
Led migration from Cloudera Data Analytics Studio to Tez UI, eliminating dependencies on closed-source software and licensing.
Architected and implemented Oozie-orchestrated ETL pipeline for Ranger audit logs, automating conversion to Parquet format and enabling critical PowerBI analytics across multiple production clusters.
Contributed to Apache Ambari by implementing Livy as an individual service in the Bigtop Stack, enabling proper integration with Ambari deployment,configuration management, and monitoring. (PR #3790)
Enhanced Docker containerized Hadoop development environment by implementing local RPM repositories and enabled Ambari deployment workflows, significantly reducing setup time for developers.
Migrated Greenplum SQL macros to Databricks with cross-functional teams, preserving functionality while improving data processing workflow efficiency
Improved automated testing and software integration framework
Contributed to JUnit test suite and provided technical documentation
Prototyped user-end web portals for device monitoring and management
Wrote a library of user-end Python and Shell scripts to manage IoT edge devices
Provided technical documentation for internal and end-user software tools

projects.name: Santa Cruz Stranding Map
projects.description: Geospatial data analysis tool for the UCSC Long Marine Lab.
